attributes.additional_details:
As a practising British Muslim, I urge HM Government to take all measures to rid the world of ISIS extremists.  They are a shame on the face of humanity and Islam.

All non-Muslims under the jurisdiction of a Muslim State are under the inviolable protection of Allah and His Prophet as 'Zimmiz' [meaning the Protected Ones].  Their blood, their rights and their property are a sacred trust in Islam.
